name: Boxpusher 4D
description:
Tired of pushing boxes in only 2 dimensions? Instead of going to merely 3, we've immediately taken it one step further by skipping to 4-dimensional box pushing.

There are some 4D mazes to get yourself oriented / disoriented, and you can also switch the way you view dimensions to really mess things up. A few box pushing levels are included, but the real fun is in the level editor. It has a built-in generator which produces random layouts and tries to generate the hardest possible levels in them. You'll be amazed at the complexity of some of the generated 4x4x4x4 puzzles.

Current status: It works. There are now 16 levels, including tutorial levels. The interface, especially of the level editor, still needs a lot of work.
